scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "REACT,ELECTRON" -c "cyan,blue" "cross-env PORT=3200 BROWSER=none npm --prefix renderer start" "wait-on tcp:3200 && tsc -p tsconfig.json --watch" "wait-on dist/main.js && electron dist/main.js"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-main && npm run build-renderer && electron-builder
